kinetic.client

Class BatchAbortedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • kinetic.client.KineticException
          • kinetic.client.BatchAbortedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BatchAbortedException
extends KineticException
    This exception indicates a batch commit (END_BATCH) was unsuccessful. All commands performed within the batch were not committed to the persistent store.
    Author:
    chiaming
    See Also:
    BatchOperation, Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getFiledOperationIndex

        public int getFiledOperationIndex()
        Get the failed command index number starting with 0 for the first command. For example, if the second command failed, it returns 1;
        Returns:
        the failed command index number starting with 0 for the first command

      • setFailedOperationIndex

        Set failed operation command index within the batch.
